level.heading: Establishment of the BOOT CAMP.
level.text: The Director of the Department of Human Services ("Director") shall establish a BOOT CAMP that may be used for eligible juvenile offenders who the Department of Human Services may permit to serve their commitment in the BOOT CAMP.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 10-67
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-67, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 24-921.
